column4: Daily Mail article is very confusing when it comes to advice: the title and first few sentences imply that people should eat 2 pieces of chocolate a week to reduce their heart disease risk, while later they go on explaining how researchers did not measure the exact amount necessary to produce the effect and that they do not recommend eating chocolate at all.
